name: Motion Vectors Visualization
author: boksajak
description:
A quick way for visualizing motion vectors as a post-processing pass (a full-screen quad).
1. For each pixel within a n x n block, load motion vector in its center
2. Draw black or white based on distance of current pixel to line denoting a motion vector

name: bpafs pulse
author: theinventor13
description: variable wavelength
image_code: const float pi = 3.141592653589; float mmod(float a, float b) { return a - floor(a/b); } void mainImage( out vec4 fragColor, in vec2 fragCoord ) { vec2 uv = fragCoord/iResolution.xy; vec2 c1 = vec2(0.5,0.5); float n = 2.0*mmod(iTime,1.0); float a = cos(length(uv - c1) * 6.0 * n * 2.0 * pi) * sin(length(uv - c1) * 4.0 * (n+1.0) * 2.0 * pi); vec3 col = vec3(0,1,0) * a; fragColor = vec4(col,1.0); }

name: Temporal Highpassed TPDF Dither
author: TheSandvichMaker
description:
Create TPDF noise by subtracting the previous frame's noise from the current frame's noise for a 1 tap highpass.
Try pausing the shader to see how the regular and highpassed versions look identical when not in motion.

Using iq's integer hash II.

name: More Accurate Ellipse Normal
author: scratch13764

name: Voronoi Cell Boundaries

description: Simple method for Voronoi cell boundaries - keep 3 closest points and check bisector between first and third as well as first and second. Also allow cell point to travel outside cell boundary (we check 16 cells around nearest grid point).

Real ecolocation with three mikes can be more precise than this.

This is a shader that implements different triangle interpolation variants.
The list is not exhaustive.

These algorithms are intentionally not optimized in order to remain close to their underlying reasonings.

name: double vs single precision
author: JoshScholar
description:
jesosk's simple-mandelbrot with a double precision library plugged in.  Single precision on the bottom. 

Note, the weird coding with the use of mix was to keep overly zealous compilers from optimizing the operations into orders which lose precision.

name: Candle Doodle
author: BigWIngs
description: Candle flames seem to be all the rage lately. I had this candle doodle lying around from the shadertoy compo two years ago. Code is a mess but I thought it'd make a nice addition to all the flames we are seeing lately.

name: Ribbon Shell Sculpture

description: Raymarched sphere made of gradient noise that resembles some sort of abstract sculputre. Move mouse left/right to change thickness and up/down to change noise frequency.
